text: Mr Wong did an excellent job cleaning the mould inside my grand piano. Looked like new again after he'd finished the job. Furthermore he was prepared to come over just for the cleaning. Other service providers would only clean provided tuning services were included. Highly recommended.

Wong did an amazing job and was very helpful! Gave a lot of informative tips on how to maintain my piano which I appreciate. He was on time and provided his service at a very affordable rate. Glad to have found my dedicated piano tuner and will definitely be engaging him for regular tunings moving forward!

Mr Wong was very prompt in responding and confirming our appointment, he even sent a gentle reminder a day before. I appreciate the advice he's given with regard to our 20-year old piano. Will definitely engage him again for subsequent tuning.
Very professional piano tuner. The sound was so smooth after the turning. Best tuner I have ever come across. Thanks Mr Wong

I am really appreciative and glad that i had engaged Mr Wong to fix my piano ! I had the key fobs fully replaced and piano tuned to concert quality. He is well equipped with info that helped me understand better my piano condition. Will definitely seek JPS for tuning and piano services again ! Well recommended üëçüèªüëçüèª
